Instruction: Cook lo mein noodles according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
Chop carrots, broccoli, and snap peas into bite-sized pieces.
Heat olive oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger to the hot wok and stir-fry for 30 seconds, or until fragrant.
Add carrots and broccoli to the wok and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, or until slightly tender.
Add snap peas and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Push vegetables to the side of the wok and add cooked lo mein noodles. Stir-fry for 1 minute.
Combine soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, and red pepper flakes in a small bowl. Pour over the noodles and vegetables.
Stir-fry for another minute to coat everything in the sauce.
Serve immediately, garnished with chopped green onions.
